title: It only seems unfair that Oce doesn't have normal draft pick
body: I mean if you don't want two normal game queues, then go with the draft pick , not blind ....

replies.body: While I don't think unfair is the right word, I would prefer draft pick.
I would take the extra wait time for guarantee of my role and no stupid kids arguing in chat

Some people might not want to be locked into a role, some people might not want to take the extra time involved in draft pick. OCE can't have two normal queues because there just aren't enough players.

> Some people might not want to be locked into a role, some people might not want to take the extra time involved in draft pick. OCE can't have two normal queues because there just aren't enough players.

Because blind pick with role calling doesn't result in people playing roles that they don't want? Op doesn't want two queues, I don't want two queues, we want to get rid of the toxic blind queue.
